subject: home
body:
krishna darling
last month you were in san hanover, then morocco, then berlin. today you're flying out to where ever it is this time, and I don't see you again until you stop by on the way to new york. I wish you were home more.
I know you love your career but I didn't marry your career, I married you. I love you.
when you get back from new york. Please stay with me in Cairo. I can't keep doing this

love,
kiran
